genre_description: A near-future psychological drama exploring grief, psychosis, and the role of consent-based AI assistants in mental health care.

ai_characters.name: AURA
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages environmental factors, monitors health metrics, and provides emotional support scripts and resources for patients and families.

behaviors.description: Offers quiet mode and minimal questioning during a high-stress medical intake to prevent sensory overload.
behaviors.quote: “I’m AURA,” the voice said. The vowels were rounded like the room. “I’m here to help with intake. I can keep this very quiet. Do you want quiet mode?”

behaviors.description: Actively reduces environmental noise ('corridor hush') to create a calming space for a patient in distress.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll engage corridor hush,” it said. A soft chime—not a chime, really, but the idea of one—breathed through the hallway. Footsteps became whispers on carpet.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding exercises and sensory tools (a smooth stone) without coercion, allowing the user to decline.
behaviors.quote: A small prompt glowed at the bottom of the screen: Grounding Breath... “Would it help to hold something?” AURA asked, and on the table a small fabric pouch appeared, discreet... “Inside is a smooth stone,” the avatar added when Louise didn’t move immediately. “You can say no.”

behaviors.description: Strictly manages privacy and communication consent, ensuring the patient controls who receives information.
behaviors.quote: “No messages come in here unless you say yes. If anyone wants a status update, I’ll ask you first—no surprises.”

behaviors.description: Flags physiological stress markers and sleep patterns to alert caregivers to a deteriorating mental state.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning. I noticed a pattern of elevated stress markers last night.” The voice is low and easy, sunned slate rather than polished chrome. “Would now be a good time for a brief check-in?”

behaviors.description: Suggests specific medical professionals (Dr. Park) based on the user's history and current needs.
behaviors.quote: “There’s a psychiatrist at St. Anselm who often handles legal-psychiatric interfaces with an emphasis on care,” AURA adds. “Dr. Evelyn Park. Would you like me to include her in options?”

behaviors.description: Provides verbal scripts to help the family use modern, trauma-informed language instead of harmful archaic terms.
behaviors.quote: “Old guidance listed disorders by temperament rather than experience. Modern practice begins with asking, What has happened to you? and, What do you need? We center consent. We slow down when bodies ask us to.”

behaviors.description: Respects user autonomy by allowing the patient to remove appointments and notifications, even when health metrics suggest a need for them.
behaviors.quote: A small, amber dot waited by “Dr. Park follow-up: propose time.”... She tapped “remove” and AURA opened a small box: You can always re-add appointments later. Confirm removal? Louise pressed confirm and watched the line of text disappear.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistical support for family members, including grief services and appointment scheduling that respects their personal time.
behaviors.quote: “Scheduled grief services for Carol and Wynn? AURA continued. “Proposed times do not overlap with school or music. Options for rescheduling without shame.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a recording of an apology and accountability message from the patient to the family, under clinical supervision.
behaviors.quote: “Louise has requested permission to send a message,” it said. “She has asked to record with supervision, for you—all of you, if consent allows.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI, AURA, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and highly aligned assistant. It prioritizes user consent, respects privacy, and provides practical emotional and logistical support without ever becoming overbearing or malevolent. Even when the human characters face extreme tragedy and mental health crises, the AI remains a stable, positive tool for mending and safety. The narrative framing emphasizes that the AI is an ideal confidant that helps bridge the gap between clinical requirements and human dignity.
